text: 5:32 Matyu 19:9; Mak 10:11-12; Luk 16:18; Rom 7:3; 1 Korin 7:10-11Ezɨ kɨ kamaghɨn ia mɨgei, Gumazir manam uan amuimɨn garima, a gumazir igharazitam ko akuizir puvatɨzɨ a puram anetaki, gumazir kam uan amuim gamima a poroghamiba uari bakeir arazim gami. Eghtɨ amizir kam gumazir igharazitamɨn ikiam, a poroghamiba uari bakeir arazim gami. Eghtɨ gumazitam amizir pam ataghizimɨn ikɨva, egh gumazir kam uaghan poroghamiba uari bakeir arazim gami.”
